ds_id: EU's AI regulations receive support of Google and Meta@Business Upturn@2023-06-24 17:34:29.935806@Meta
data_content: Meta Platforms CEO Mark Zuckerberg and OpenAI CEO Sam Altman have expressed support for the European Union's artificial intelligence policy following discussions with European Commissioner Thierry Breton. Both technology industry executives agreed to measures like watermarking and the bloc’s risk-based approach. The EU is currently finalizing negotiations on the policy. Nick Clegg, Meta's President of Global Affairs, also stated his company's support for the AI Pact and the importance of openness and collaborative engagement with governments and civil society. Commissioner Breton added that Meta seemed well-prepared to comply with Europe's new stringent content moderation regulations.
